drinks.name: Caipirinha
drinks.description: A refreshing and citrusy Brazilian classic.
steps: Cut the lime into quarters and remove the white core to avoid bitterness.
Muddle the lime with sugar in a glass.
Add ice cubes, pour in the cachaça, and stir well.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail, perfect for hot days.
steps: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice in a glass.
Add ice cubes and rum, then top off with soda water.
Garnish with more mint leaves.

drinks.name: Pisco
drinks.description: A traditional Peruvian drink with a citrus twist.
steps: In a shaker, combine pisco, lime juice, sugar, and egg white.
Shake vigorously with ice until frothy.
Strain into a glass and add a dash of bitters if desired.

drinks.name: Gin & Tonic
steps: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour in gin and top off with tonic water.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Traçadinho
drinks.description: A delicious Portuguese drink very used by university students.
steps: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour equal parts of wine and lemon soda.
Stir gently and serve.

drinks.name: Poncha
drinks.description: A traditional Madeiran drink, sweet and tangy.
steps: In a shaker, combine aguardente, honey, and lemon juice.
Shake vigorously until well mixed.
Serve over ice in a glass.

drinks.name: Piña Colada
drinks.description: A tropical cocktail with a creamy, fruity flavor.
steps: In a blender, combine rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and ice.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.description: A sophisticated cocktail with a smooth finish.
steps: Pour gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

Pairing.name: Ceviche
